scripts.build:business: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js  --bundle-output dist/business/business.android.bundle --sourcemap-output dist/business/business.android.map --assets-dest dist/business/asserts  --config ../../../../business.config.js
scripts.build:base: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file base.js  --bundle-output dist/base/base.android.bundle --sourcemap-output dist/base/base.android.map --assets-dest dist/base/asserts  --config ../../../../metro.config.js
scripts.build:android: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android  --dev true --entry-file index.js  --bundle-output  android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle  --assets-dest  android/app/src/main/res/
